body: Aren't we supporting arbitrary output shapes in dot product? Looks like the only limitation is that inputs should be of the same shape https://github.com/mdschatz/pytorch/blob/1a215b2c8dbecf0368b6b02bd3203c1699db1e44/caffe2/operators/distance_op.cc#L204
